name: Fyodor Biotechnologies, Inc.
description: Developer of a non-invasive malaria testing technology designed to deliver a simple system to major global health problems. The company's technology helps people with a fever to diagnose malaria using a few drops of urine instead of blood, enabling healthcare professionals to help patients diagnose malaria conveniently and minimize pain and blood loss.
one_liner: Developer of a non-invasive malaria testing technology designed to deliver a simple system to major global health problems.
